original_text: So Benhadad hearkened unto king Asa, and sent the captains of the hosts which he had against the cities of Israel, and smote Ijon, and Dan, and Abelbethmaachah, and all Cinneroth, with all the land of Naphtali.
korean_text: 벤하닷이 아사 왕의 말을 듣고 그의 군대 지휘관들을 보내 이스라엘 성읍들을 치되 이욘과 단과 아벨벧마아가와 긴네렛 온 땅과 납달리 온 땅을 쳤더니

sentences.original_text: So Benhadad hearkened unto king Asa
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 벤하닷은 아사 왕의 말을 들었다

sentences.original_text: and sent the captains of the hosts
which he had against the cities of Israel
with all the land of Naphtali
